item.title: Getting the job and growing in the job
item.description:
Panel on Getting the Job / Growing in the Job, with a focus on the role of professional mentorship

Drop in Mentorship Hours with volunteer mentors

item.title: Integrating Tableau and R with Jarrett Hurms
item.description: Join us for this seminar how on to effectively integrate Tableau and R for easer, more efficient data analysis.

item.title: Scrapping for a Data Job with Sia
item.description: Scrapping for a Data Job: A brief description of natural language processing, and an ongoing application of it to show how it is being used to make a data science job search more efficient

item.title: Introduction to R with Dr. Nayena Blankson
Data Journeys Panel
item.description: Data Journeys: Health information, technology, informatics, data science, epidemiology, social science, and self-teaching. Fireside chat with TIDES, Kimberly, Odane, Teneika, Amber, Ruth, and Blossom.

item.title: Data analytics careers after 40
item.description: Lunchtime webinar on how to enter the data analytics careers after age 40.

item.title: #BlackInDataJourney #BlackInDataStory
item.description: Tell us how you got in data and include the hashtag #BlackInDataJourney!

item.title: #BlackInDataRollCall
item.description:
Introduce yourself and tell us what you do in data and include the hashtag #BlackInDataRollCall and tag @BlkInData

Sign up to be a mentor or mentee for Drop-In Mentorship Hours throughout the week!
